com.tinmegali.security.mcipher

Interface MEncryptor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MEncryptorDefault

    public interface MEncryptor
    Encryption interface that facilitates the encryption process. Build a MEncryptor using its builder, the MEncryptorBuilder.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      byte[] encrypt(byte[] dataToEncrypt, android.content.Context context)
      Encrypts a byte array.
      byte[] encrypt(java.lang.String textToEncrypt, android.content.Context context)
      Encrypts a String, returning an encrypted byte array.
      java.lang.String encryptString(java.lang.String textToEncrypt, android.content.Context context)
      Encrypt a given String.
      java.lang.String getAlias()
      Get the current Key Alias, defined during build time, used as an unique identifier in the KeyStore.

    • Method Detail

      • encryptString

        java.lang.String encryptString(java.lang.String textToEncrypt,
                               android.content.Context context)
                        throws MEncryptorException
        Encrypt a given String. Notice that the encryption particularities will be defined during the MEncryptor build.
        Parameters:
        textToEncrypt - a String to be encrypted.
        context - the context must only be passed when the method is called from SDK previous to 23.
        Returns:
        a String encoded with MCipherUtils.encodeEncrypted(byte[]) helper method, containing the encrypted data.
        Throws:
        MEncryptorException - a wrapper Exception that encapsulates all possible exceptions thrown by the encryption process. To get the original Exception, if it has one, call Throwable.getCause().
        See Also:
        MCipherUtils.encodeEncrypted(byte[])

      • encrypt

        byte[] encrypt(byte[] dataToEncrypt,
               android.content.Context context)
        throws MEncryptorException
        Encrypts a byte array. Notice that the encryption particularities will be defined during the MEncryptor build.
        Parameters:
        dataToEncrypt - byte array to be encrypted.
        context - the context must only be passed when the method is called from SDK previous to 23.
        Returns:
        a byte array containing the encrypted data.
        Throws:
        MEncryptorException - a wrapper Exception that encapsulates all possible exceptions thrown by the encryption process. To get the original Exception, if it has one, call Throwable.getCause().

      • encrypt

        byte[] encrypt(java.lang.String textToEncrypt,
               android.content.Context context)
        throws MEncryptorException
        Encrypts a String, returning an encrypted byte array. Notice that the encryption particularities will be defined during the MEncryptor build.
        Parameters:
        textToEncrypt - a String to be encrypted.
        context - the context must only be passed when the method is called from SDK previous to 23.
        Returns:
        a byte array containing the encrypted data.
        Throws:
        MEncryptorException - a wrapper Exception that encapsulates all possible exceptions thrown by the encryption process. To get the original Exception, if it has one, call Throwable.getCause().

      • getAlias

        java.lang.String getAlias()
        Get the current Key Alias, defined during build time, used as an unique identifier in the KeyStore.
        Returns:
        the current alias of the MEncryptor.
